title: Pels Strong Start, Nets Struggles, What Is Going On In Utah?
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Andrew Lopez and Nick Friedell to discuss what potential exists for the Pelicans this season after a strong debut, the flaws on the Nets that need to be addressed to make the team a legitimate contender and ‘What Is Going On In’ Utah after an unexpectedly successful start. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: What Is The Potential For The Pelicans? Why The Nets Need To Address Their Defense
